definition: to make a round trip/return journey/back and forth/to and fro/repeatedly
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
to curve/to return/to revolve
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
variant of 迴|回[hui2]
repeatedly/back and forth again and again
backwards and forwards
to make a round trip/a return journey
to make a round trip/a return journey

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket between Hong Kong and Sanya on Dragonair.
sentences.chinese: 港龙航空公司来回香港至三亚经济客位机票乙张。

sentences.english: They bandied the ball from player to player while they waited the game to start.
sentences.chinese: 他们在等比赛开始的时候把球在队员之间来回传递。

sentences.english: The windshield wipers swished back and forth monotonously.
sentences.chinese: 挡风玻璃上的雨刷单调地来回摆动，发出飕飕声。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Bohol via Manila on PR.
sentences.chinese: 宿雾航空公司来回香港至保和经马尼拉经济客位机票。

sentences.english: Give me two first-class retum tickets to Hastings, please.
sentences.chinese: 请给我一张周末回程的二等来回票。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Xiamen on KA.
sentences.chinese: 港龙航空公司来回香港至厦门机票。

sentences.english: This created an interesting back-and-forth on the comments section of the article. For instance,  Mike Amundsen states
sentences.chinese: 这篇博文引起了一组有趣的来来回回的评论。

sentences.english: Roundtrip transfer between airport & Kinabalu Park HQ.
sentences.chinese: 来回机场至神山公园总部之接送。

sentences.english: Slip into a chair or remain upright, and sway back and forth.
sentences.chinese: 滑进一张椅子中，或者保持直立，来回的摇晃。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and San Francisco on SQ.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡航空公司来回香港至三藩市机票。

sentences.english: Yeah, over the past 2 years I've been back and forth in Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 是，过去两年我来来回回去了巴西好多次。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Kaohsiung on KA.
sentences.chinese: 港龙航空公司来回香港至高雄机票。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Sydney on QF.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲航空公司来回香港至悉尼机票。

sentences.english: All day they swung up and down the main street in long teams.
sentences.chinese: 从早到晚他们都排着长队在大街上来来回回转着。

sentences.english: The Elevated Pedestians' Walk may guide you to all pavilions.
sentences.chinese: 经过园区的高架平台能够利便地来回于各个展馆。

sentences.english: Draw the floss backwards and forwards between the teeth.
sentences.chinese: 将牙线在齿间来回拉动。

definition: to go back and forth/to go to and fro/round trip
repeatedly/back and forth again and again
incessant
to rotate/to twirl/to run around/to encircle/rotation/(coll.) to speak indirectly/to beat about the bush
to rove around/to run around in circles/to walk back and forth
to travel back and forth/to shuttle
to rock/to sway/to shake
to swing/to sway/to wobble/to hang around/to hover around
to walk around/to move about/to stretch one's legs/to go for a walk/to be mobile (e.g. after an illness)/to visit one another/to pay a visit (go to the toilet)
several times
to roll/(to do sth) in a loop/to scroll (computing)/to progressively expand (economics)/to rumble (of thunder)
up and down/top and bottom/old and new/length/about
to spin/to rotate/to revolve
to sway/to rock
to stop/to halt/to park (a car)
every time
